file_content.text: This is Director Antayen to all Czerka employees. Please listen and remain calm.
A few minutes ago, we experienced a minor equipment failure in the main laboratory.
As a precaution, we are initiating lockdown procedures. Do not attempt to override the systems or the computers will respond with force.
Stay where you are, and you'll be alerted when the situation resolves.
The Imprisoned One will be free. The rebirth has begun.
